Rotate axis text

rot_x.Rd

Rotate axis text

rot_x(angle = 30, hjust = 1)

rot_y(angle = 30, hjust = 1)

Arguments

angle

passed to ggplot::element_text
hjust

passed to ggplot::element_text

Examples

data <- pmplots_data_obs()

dv_pred(data) + rot_x()
